+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+import "package:flutter/material.dart";
+
+void main() {
+  runApp(const MyApp());
+}
+
+class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
+  const MyApp({super.key});
+
+  // This widget is the root of your application.
+  @override
+  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
+    return MaterialApp(
+      title: "Flutter Demo",
+      theme: ThemeData(
+        colorScheme: ColorScheme.fromSeed(seedColor: Colors.deepPurple),
+        textTheme: const TextTheme(
+          titleLarge: TextStyle(
+            fontSize: 45.0,
+            fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
+            color: Colors.black,
+          ),
+          titleMedium: TextStyle(
+            fontSize: 30.0,
+            fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
+            color: Colors.black,
+          ),
+          displayLarge: Te
+        ),
+        useMaterial3: true,
+      ),
+      home: Builder(
+        builder: (BuildContext context) {
+          ThemeData theme = Theme.of(context);
+
+          return Scaffold(
+            body: Flex(
+              direction: Axis.horizontal,
+              crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.stretch,
+              children: <Widget>[
+                Expanded(
+                  child: DecoratedBox(
+                    decoration: const BoxDecoration(
+                      gradient: LinearGradient(
+                        begin: Alignment.topCenter,
+                        end: Alignment.bottomCenter,
+                        colors: <Color>[
+                          Color.fromRGBO(255, 250, 227, 1.0),
+                          Color.fromRGBO(247, 202, 201, 1.0),
+                        ],
+                      ),
+                    ),
+                    child: SingleChildScrollView(
+                      child: Column(
+                        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
+                        children: <Widget>[
+                          Padding(
+                            padding: const EdgeInsets.all(32.0),
+                            child: Column(
+                              mainAxisSize: MainAxisSize.min,
+                              crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
+                              children: <Widget>[
+                                Text("Hello,\n[User]!", style: theme.textTheme.titleLarge),
+                                Text("Let's see what's in store for you!", style: theme.textTheme.titleMedium),
+                              ],
+                            ),
+                          ),
+                          Column(
+                            children: <Widget>[
+                              Padding(
+                                padding: const EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 32.0),
+                                child: Row(
+                                  children: <Widget>[
+                                    const Text("nearing expiry"),
+                                    TextButton(
+                                      onPressed: () {
+                                        print("You pressed me brother");
+                                      },
+                                      child: const Text(">"),
+                                    ),
+                                  ],
+                                ),
+                              ),
+                            ],
+                          ),
+                        ],
+                      ),
+                    ),
+                  ),
+                ),
+              ],
+            ),
+          );
+        },
+      ),
+    );
+  }
+}
